name: Mera Info digital Networks
tag_list: roy-thomas, md9t, smsgal, new-start-up, no-1-growing-company, young-company
overview: Mid9t Group is a privately held company formed in May 2010 to design and build web services & products. We strive to create innovative, leading-edge products that are fun and easy to use while providing rich functionality. Our company name was created by a short code “Mid9t!”-which expanded as Mera India digital Networks (P) Ltd. This is the first time ever an Indian company uses such a name. Our Company which originally starts in Coimbatore,Tamil Nadu on 2008,and it replaced to Indore with some financial crisis.The company as a dream of Roy thomas,a Software Engineer from Anna University-now working as our MD and CEO. Our logo reflects our philosophy: simple, Useful, and free. We enjoy our work immensely, and we hope you enjoy our products.
